title: Another giant step for large-scale solar at Broken Hill (ARENA - Australian Renewable Energy Agency) ...
text: ( Source : ARENA - Australian Renewable Energy Agency ) Just off the Barrier Highway , a new 'big' Australian landmark is on the cusp of completion with the installation of the final solar panel at the Broken Hill Solar Plant . ARENA, AGL and
